trans-unit.source: Configure and register your device
trans-unit.target: Configure and register your device

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and register your device.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to configure and register your device.

trans-unit.source: To configure and register the device
trans-unit.target: To configure and register the device

trans-unit.source: Access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.
trans-unit.target: Access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.

trans-unit.source: See [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console) for instructions.
trans-unit.target: See [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console) for instructions.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to follow the procedure exactly or you will not be able to access the console.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to follow the procedure exactly or you will not be able to access the console.

trans-unit.source: In the session that opens up, press Enter one time to get a command prompt.
trans-unit.target: In the session that opens up, press Enter one time to get a command prompt.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted to choose the language that you would like to set for your device.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted to choose the language that you would like to set for your device.

trans-unit.source: Specify the language, and then press Enter.
trans-unit.target: Specify the language, and then press Enter.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple configure and register device 1
trans-unit.target: StorSimple configure and register device 1

trans-unit.source: In the serial console menu that is presented, choose option 1 to log on with full access.
trans-unit.target: In the serial console menu that is presented, choose option 1 to log on with full access.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple register device 2
trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 2

trans-unit.source: Complete steps 5-12 to configure the minimum required network settings for your device.
trans-unit.target: Complete steps 5-12 to configure the minimum required network settings for your device.

trans-unit.source: These configuration steps need to be performed on the active controller of the device.
trans-unit.target: These configuration steps need to be performed on the active controller of the device.

trans-unit.source: The serial console menu indicates the controller state in the banner message.
trans-unit.target: The serial console menu indicates the controller state in the banner message.

trans-unit.source: If you are not connected to the active controller, disconnect and then connect to the active controller.
trans-unit.target: If you are not connected to the active controller, disconnect and then connect to the active controller.

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, type your password.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, type your password.

trans-unit.source: The default device password is **Password1**.
trans-unit.target: The default device password is **Password1**.

trans-unit.source: Type the following command:
trans-unit.target: Type the following command:

trans-unit.source: A setup wizard will appear to help you configure the network settings for the device.
trans-unit.target: A setup wizard will appear to help you configure the network settings for the device.

trans-unit.source: Supply the the following information:
trans-unit.target: Supply the the following information:

trans-unit.source: IP address for the DATA 0 network interface
trans-unit.target: IP address for the DATA 0 network interface

trans-unit.source: Subnet mask
trans-unit.target: Subnet mask

trans-unit.source: Gateway
trans-unit.target: Gateway

trans-unit.source: IP address for Primary DNS server
trans-unit.target: IP address for Primary DNS server

trans-unit.source: IP address for Primary NTP server
trans-unit.target: IP address for Primary NTP server

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You may have to wait for a few minutes for the subnet mask and the DNS settings to be applied.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You may have to wait for a few minutes for the subnet mask and the DNS settings to be applied.

trans-unit.source: If you get a "The device is not ready."
trans-unit.target: If you get a "The device is not ready."

trans-unit.source: error message, check the physical network connection on the DATA 0 network interface of your active controller.
trans-unit.target: error message, check the physical network connection on the DATA 0 network interface of your active controller.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) configure your web proxy server.
trans-unit.target: (Optional) configure your web proxy server.

trans-unit.source: Although web proxy configuration is optional, **be aware that if you use a web proxy, you can only configure it here**.
trans-unit.target: Although web proxy configuration is optional, **be aware that if you use a web proxy, you can only configure it here**.

trans-unit.source: For more information, go to [Configure web proxy for your device](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn764937.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more information, go to [Configure web proxy for your device](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn764937.aspx).

trans-unit.source: If you run into any issues during this step, refer to troubleshooting guidance for [Errors during web proxy configuration](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-during-the-optional-web-proxy-settings).
trans-unit.target: If you run into any issues during this step, refer to troubleshooting guidance for [Errors during web proxy configuration](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-during-the-optional-web-proxy-settings).

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, the device administrator password expires after the first session, and you will need to change it for subsequent sessions.
trans-unit.target: For security reasons, the device administrator password expires after the first session, and you will need to change it for subsequent sessions.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, provide a device administrator password.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, provide a device administrator password.

trans-unit.source: A valid device administrator password must be between 8 and 15 characters.
trans-unit.target: A valid device administrator password must be between 8 and 15 characters.

trans-unit.source: The password must contain a combination of lowercase characters, uppercase characters, numbers, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: The password must contain a combination of lowercase characters, uppercase characters, numbers, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager password is also set here.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple Snapshot Manager password is also set here.

trans-unit.source: You use this password when you authenticate a device with your Windows host running StorSimple Snapshot Manager.
trans-unit.target: You use this password when you authenticate a device with your Windows host running StorSimple Snapshot Manager.

trans-unit.source: When prompted, provide a 14 to 15 character password.
trans-unit.target: When prompted, provide a 14 to 15 character password.

trans-unit.source: The password must contain a combination of three of the following: lowercase, uppercase, numeric, and special characters.
trans-unit.target: The password must contain a combination of three of the following: lowercase, uppercase, numeric, and special characters.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple register device 4
trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 4

trans-unit.source: You can reset the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password from the StorSimple Manager service interface.
trans-unit.target: You can reset the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password from the StorSimple Manager service interface.

trans-unit.source: For detailed steps, go to [Change the StorSimple passwords using the StorSimple Manager serivce](storsimple-change-passwords.md).
trans-unit.target: For detailed steps, go to [Change the StorSimple passwords using the StorSimple Manager serivce](storsimple-change-passwords.md).

trans-unit.source: To troubleshoot any issues during this step, refer to troubleshooting guidance for [Errors related to passwords](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-related-to-device-administrator-and-storsimple-snapshot-manager-passwords).
trans-unit.target: To troubleshoot any issues during this step, refer to troubleshooting guidance for [Errors related to passwords](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-related-to-device-administrator-and-storsimple-snapshot-manager-passwords).

trans-unit.source: The final step in the setup wizard registers your device with the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: The final step in the setup wizard registers your device with the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: For this, you will need the service registration key that you obtained in step 2.
trans-unit.target: For this, you will need the service registration key that you obtained in step 2.

trans-unit.source: After you supply the registration key, you may need to wait for 2-3 minutes before the device is registered.
trans-unit.target: After you supply the registration key, you may need to wait for 2-3 minutes before the device is registered.

trans-unit.source: To troubleshoot any possible device registration failures, refer to [Errors during device registration](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-during-device-registration).
trans-unit.target: To troubleshoot any possible device registration failures, refer to [Errors during device registration](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#errors-during-device-registration).

trans-unit.source: For detailed troubleshooting, you can also refer to [Step-by-step troubleshooting example](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#step-by-step-storsimple-troubleshooting-example).
trans-unit.target: For detailed troubleshooting, you can also refer to [Step-by-step troubleshooting example](storsimple-troubleshoot-deployment.md#step-by-step-storsimple-troubleshooting-example).

trans-unit.source: After the device is registered, a Service Data Encryption key will appear.
trans-unit.target: After the device is registered, a Service Data Encryption key will appear.

trans-unit.source: Copy this key and save it in a safe location.
trans-unit.target: Copy this key and save it in a safe location.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.WARNING] This key will be required with the service registration key to register additional devices with the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.WARNING] This key will be required with the service registration key to register additional devices with the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Refer to [StorSimple security](../articles/storsimple/storsimple-security.md) for more information about this key.
trans-unit.target: Refer to [StorSimple security](../articles/storsimple/storsimple-security.md) for more information about this key.

trans-unit.source: StorSimple register device 6
trans-unit.target: StorSimple register device 6

trans-unit.source: To copy the text from the serial console window, simply select the text.
trans-unit.target: To copy the text from the serial console window, simply select the text.

trans-unit.source: You should then be able to paste it in the clipboard or any text editor.
trans-unit.target: You should then be able to paste it in the clipboard or any text editor.

trans-unit.source: DO NOT use Ctrl + C to copy the service data encryption key.
trans-unit.target: DO NOT use Ctrl + C to copy the service data encryption key.

trans-unit.source: Using Ctrl + C will cause you to exit the setup wizard.
trans-unit.target: Using Ctrl + C will cause you to exit the setup wizard.

trans-unit.source: As a result, the device administrator password and the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password will not be changed and the device will revert to the default passwords.
trans-unit.target: As a result, the device administrator password and the StorSimple Snapshot Manager password will not be changed and the device will revert to the default passwords.

trans-unit.source: Exit the serial console.
trans-unit.target: Exit the serial console.

trans-unit.source: Return to the Management Portal, and complete the following steps:
trans-unit.target: Return to the Management Portal, and complete the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Double-click your StorSimple Manager service to access the **Quick Start** page.
trans-unit.target: Double-click your StorSimple Manager service to access the **Quick Start** page.

trans-unit.source: Click **View connected devices**.
trans-unit.target: Click **View connected devices**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Devices** page, verify that the device has successfully connected to the service by looking up the status.
trans-unit.target: On the **Devices** page, verify that the device has successfully connected to the service by looking up the status.

trans-unit.source: The device status should be **Online**.
trans-unit.target: The device status should be **Online**.

trans-unit.source: If the device status is **Offline**, wait for a couple of minutes for the device to come online.
trans-unit.target: If the device status is **Offline**, wait for a couple of minutes for the device to come online.

trans-unit.source: After the device is successfully registered and doesn't come online, you can run the `Test-HcsmConnection -Verbose` to ensure that the network connectivity is healthy.
trans-unit.target: After the device is successfully registered and doesn't come online, you can run the `Test-HcsmConnection -Verbose` to ensure that the network connectivity is healthy.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed usage of this cmdlet, go to [cmdlet reference for Test-HcsmConnection](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn715782.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed usage of this cmdlet, go to [cmdlet reference for Test-HcsmConnection](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/dn715782.aspx).
